A1: for reinforcements to be sent from Crimea
RelatedSentence: Serhy Zdryliuk , aka Abwer , the deputy commander of the self - proclaimed Donetsk People 's Republic , has asked for reinforcements to be sent from Crimea .
His appeal came during his telephone conversation with Crimean journalists , Ukrinform reported May 18 .

Earlier on May 17 , in a televised address the leader of the DPR and Russia intelligence service officer Igor Strelkov complained about the low response Donbas residents show to his invitations to take up arms and fight for Donbas .
